info.title: WatchDog API
info.description:
WatchDog infrastructure monitoring API. Authenticate with a Bearer token from **Settings > API Tokens**.

Token format: `wd_<32 hex chars>`

Scopes: `admin` (read/write) or `read_only` (GET only).

Rate limits: 10 req/s general, 5 req/s auth endpoints.

get.description: Returns whether the system needs initial admin account creation.

post.description: Creates the first admin account. Only works when no users exist.
Authenticates with email and password. Sets a session cookie.

get.description: Returns all monitors across all agents owned by the authenticated user.

post.description: Creates a new monitor on the specified agent.

get.description: Returns a summary of all monitors with status and latest heartbeat data for the dashboard.
Returns a single monitor by ID, including recent heartbeat statistics.

put.description: Updates an existing monitor. All fields are optional — only provided fields are changed.

delete.description: Permanently deletes a monitor and all associated heartbeats.

get.description: Returns heartbeat history for a monitor.
Returns aggregated latency data (avg, min, max per time bucket) for charting.
Returns all agents owned by the authenticated user.

post.description: Creates a new agent and returns its API key. **Save the API key — it cannot be retrieved again.**

delete.description: Permanently deletes an agent and all associated monitors, heartbeats, and incidents.

get.description: Returns incidents. Defaults to active (open + acknowledged). Use `?status=resolved` for resolved.

post.description: Marks an incident as acknowledged by the authenticated user.

get.description: Returns summary statistics for the authenticated user's infrastructure.
Returns all API tokens for the authenticated user. Plaintext values are not returned.

post.description: Creates a new API token. **Save the plaintext token — it cannot be retrieved again.**

plaintext.description: One-time display. Format: wd_<32 hex chars>

post.description: Generates a new token value for an existing token entry. The old token is immediately invalidated.

get.description: Returns all alert channels. Sensitive config fields (passwords, tokens) are masked.

post.description: Creates a new alert channel. Config is encrypted before storage. Channel is tested on creation.
Enables or disables an alert channel.
Sends a sample notification to verify the channel is configured correctly.
Changes the authenticated user's password. All other sessions are invalidated.

get.description: Returns all status pages owned by the authenticated user.

post.description: Creates a new status page with auto-generated slug.

get.description: Returns a status page with available monitors.
Returns public status page data. No authentication required.
Returns system diagnostics including database stats, uptime, and version. Admin only.
Returns all users with resource counts (agents, monitors). Admin only.

post.description: Generates a temporary password for a user. All their sessions are invalidated. Admin only.

password.description: Temporary password to give to the user

delete.description: Permanently deletes a user and all their resources (agents, monitors, tokens). Admin only.

get.description: Returns recent audit/security events. Admin only.

BearerAuth.description: API token from Settings > API Tokens. Format: `wd_<32 hex chars>`. Scopes: `admin` (read/write) or `read_only` (GET only).

prefix.description: First 16 chars of token for identification

config.description: discord/slack: webhook_url. email: host, from, to. telegram: bot_token, chat_id. pagerduty: routing_key. webhook: url.
